entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Random "Access violation writing location" error while calling ToFrozenDictionary after updating from .NET 8 to .NET 9 #110981
  • Does Native AOT support exporting apis by serial number? #110979
  • Calling certain native functions from custom hosted dotnet causes error #110975

Closed

  • public static readonly field not generated until accessed with no explicit static constructor #110978

PullRequests

Created

  • Use correct product version in SPC in servicing #110980
    area-System.Runtime
  • [Test] Add logging and fail-fast option when a thread is reinitialized after cleanup #110977
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Threading, Future

Merged

  • Remove redundant 'unsafe' context #110953
    area-Meta

Updated

  • Fix `ConvertTypeCheckPatternToNullCheck` #110973
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Code modernization in System.Linq #110910
    area-System.Linq
  • Fix GetModuleFileName in GetProcessPath #110888
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [JIT] [APX] Enable additional General Purpose Registers. #108799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Optimize struct parameter register accesses in the backend #110819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
